bug.description:
Hi, Since the upgrade to 1.4 I trained a few runs and each hung after a few hours. seems to be a comparable issue related here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensor2tensor/issues/494>#494</denchmark-link> and here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensor2tensor/issues/496>#496</denchmark-link>
Anyone with similar problem ? Just to be clear, it goes up to freezing the machine need a hard reboot. I trained without any issue on another toolkit (just to check it was not a hard drive / gpu issue)

comments.comment: Can you show where it hangs?
on the last run, the last log line was "saving checkpoint" after about 10-12 hours of training. Not sure for the previous ones, but I think one time was during "restoring checkpoint".
did not happen again so closing this for now
I have the same issue and it happens all the time.
